system-settings.name: Optional IdP Settings related to Logout

sub_settings.name:
Logout URL for E-Signature
In the event that an IdP is not truthful about the Auth Instant (such as updating the instant even when the user did not actually re-authenticate; i.e., SSO), the module will attempt to forcefully log the user out prior to requesting their signature. The URL provided must be capable of automatically redirecting back to a URL. Use {REDIRECT} as a placeholder in your URL, e.g., https://example.org/auth/logout?redirect={REDIRECT}

Logout URL
This is a general logout URL that a user will be directed to when they click the 'Logout' button in REDCap
